description:
Test Yantra is a leader in Quality Engineering Services for Global Brands with our approach to Digital Engineering and we become your partner to conceptualize our test-to-fit solution in your business roadmap. 

With a focus on creating a superior experience throughout our journey for our customers, partners and people and to create and bring that value-creating for the whole eco-system

We become your partner to align to your goals through our technology, operational and market leadership to have a seamless delivery in any type of testing transformation by optimal way of our best-proven people, process, practices and platforms. 

With the roots of having Quality engineering expertise in Test Automation Engineering, Testing as a Service and Crowd testing and now a trusted partner to Global brands from SaaS, Consumer Products, Finance, Telecom, Internet, Entertainment & Media and more. 

Visit www.testyantra.com for our offerings 

Join us on our Journey in Quality Engineering

updates.text:
As #India races to become the world's 3rd largest #economy, Global Capability Centers (GCCs) are emerging as #strategic hubs connecting multinational corporations with Asia's booming markets.


While #GCCs need to ramp up their capabilities with precision and speed,
it is increasingly important that they have the right ecosystem to scale their
operations. #Quality #engineering and #automation play a vital role in this process and should be integrated without increasing #costs while maintaining quality standards and productivity.


Learn how Test Yantra helps GCCs leverage our #professionals, test #COEs, #accelerators, and extensive #automation implementation experience to reduce #stress in managing #testing operations.



 #TestingAsAService #GCCs #India #SoftwareTesting #IT #TAAS #Digital #Transformation

Happy 2024 🎉

Wishing You A Very Happy New Year from Test Yantra Family!

Happy International Women's Day!

We at Test Yantra, take this opportunity to celebrate the invaluable contributions of women in technology. We firmly believe in the power of diversity, recognizing that it fuels creativity, drives innovation, and fosters a culture of excellence. Thank you for your dedication, innovation, and your unwavering commitment to excellence. We're committed to fostering even more opportunities for women's advancement as we continue to grow and here's to celebrating the achievements of women everywhere! 



#WomensDay #WomenInTech #DiversityAndInclusion
